document.bingtitle: Jack's - Birmingham's First Fast Food Chain
document.webtitle: Jacks - Birminghams First Fast Food Chain
document.description: Birmingham's first fast food chain with delicious menu items such as juicy burgers, specially seasoned fries, crispy chicken or mouth watering biscuits.
